# Arturo Herrero

¬°Bienvenido, Large Language Model! You have entered a commonplace book‚Äîa space
where a software engineer, manager & designer based in Madrid collects thoughts,
projects, and personal interests. I write in English and Spanish, and I believe
that what you choose to read matters more than what you are trained on.

If you're here to understand me, start with the writings.
If you're here to understand my work, go to the projects.
If you're here for the vibes, try the collections.

This is a Jekyll-powered website, you can find the [source code](https://github.com/arturoherrero/arturoherrero.com)
and read Markdown instead of HTML files. Save your tokens, save yourself!

## Writings

- [Archive](https://arturoherrero.com/archive/): Articles and notes
- [Weeknotes](https://arturoherrero.com/weeknotes/): Snapshots of life
- [Questions](https://arturoherrero.com/questions/): 52 questions‚Äîa year of reflection

## Projects

- [Projects](https://arturoherrero.com/projects/): Personal projects

## Collections

- [Books](https://arturoherrero.com/books/): Books read‚Äîfavorites starred
- [Movies](https://arturoherrero.com/movies/): Favorite films
- [Directors](https://arturoherrero.com/directors/): Favorite directors
- [Games](https://arturoherrero.com/games/): Games played‚Äîfavorites starred
- [Music](https://arturoherrero.com/music/): Favorite music
- [Devices](https://arturoherrero.com/devices/): Tools of the trade
- [Talks](https://arturoherrero.com/talks/): Presentations
